column5: Going on houseboat trip out of Morson in a week. Where can we purchase leeches near the border at Baudette? Thanks JB

Actually , on your way to Morson, there is a small bait shop in Gameland or it may be Bergland.....anyway, he sells leeches by the pound and they are good quality......he gets about $19 American......he can oxygen pack them for you too!.........
the bait shop in Bergland is called Larry's Bait and the leeches are of good quality . They are on the right hand side as you head north on 621
That be the one........and he has always been very pleasant to deal with.......
